name: Grauzone Festival

config_properties.name: Grauzone Festival
config_properties.description: A post-punk and darkwave festival in The Hague, Netherlands, featuring underground and alternative artists.

ai_profile:
**Grauzone Festival 2026** continues to solidify its reputation as a haven for alternative and underground music lovers, showcasing a diverse lineup of 70 artists across a wide spectrum of genres. This year’s festival highlights its roots in darkwave (12 acts) and post-punk (15 acts combined), while also embracing electronic and experimental sounds, including techno, synthpop, industrial, and EBM. With an average rating of 8.03, Grauzone promises an exceptional experience for fans of boundary-pushing music.

The festival’s lineup reflects its commitment to global representation, with artists hailing from 17 countries, including France (13 acts), the USA (16 acts combined), and the Netherlands (9 acts). Smaller but vibrant contributions from countries like Japan, Morocco, and Serbia add rich cultural diversity to the event. Grauzone also champions inclusivity, with a notable presence of female (18) and non-binary (1) artists, as well as 11 artists identifying as people of color, ensuring that the stage reflects a broad spectrum of voices and perspectives.

Known for its unique curation, Grauzone 2026 brings together emerging talent and seasoned acts across genres like shoegaze, noise rock, and dark synthwave, creating a space for artistic exploration. The inclusion of 11 DJs adds a dynamic, danceable element to the lineup. With its eclectic mix of sounds, international reach, and dedication to diversity, Grauzone continues to be a vital platform for celebrating the cutting edge of alternative music.
